card.data.forced_march.name: Forced March
card.data.forced_march.actions.basic:
Move<sprite name="card_icon_move"><style="value">2</style>.
Another card gets <style="value">+1</style> to the Movement it provides
card.data.forced_march.actions.basic.mov: Discard a card to get Move2 or activate another card to get +1 to the Movement it provides
card.data.forced_march.actions.advanced: Move4. Every other Card gets +1 to the Movement it provides
